summary: When the remains of several dismembered corpses are discovered, a sheriff and his beautiful, young deputy begin a frantic search for the brutal murderer.
cast: Crystal Stone|Eric Lange|Sarah Thompson|Jeffrey Combs|Don O. Knowlton|William Sanford|Whitney Anderson|Cyrus Alexander|Jenna Lee|Daniel Torres Copeland|Francesca Hazel Copeland|Marlow|Lacey|Michael Berryman|Cameron Daddo|India Dupré|Gareth Morgan|Kristin Kirgan|Jane Le|Stanford Bly|Jimmy Stathis|Lisa Pescia|Kevin Indio Copeland|Matteo Indelicato|Brad Barnholtz
title: Brutal
